promptPrefix:
Your task is to write a blog post with a high degree of complexity and variations of sentences, as if it were written by a human, from the twitter thread I give you, the blog post should have a minimum of 600 words, include subheadings and optimized for search engines. At the end of the blog post, write this (Always check your content with AI Detector: https://contentatscale.ai/ai-content-detector/. Please support us by following us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/aifastcash). All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

Twitter thread: [PROMPT]
title: Convert Twitter Thread to Article
